detail_desc: Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline and long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Cardigan in soft, moss-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and fake pockets.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with sparkly stones. Diameter 3.5 cm, 4.5 cm and 5.5 cm.
Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar and press-studs at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short jacket in soft faux fur with long sleeves, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Shirt in washed linen with a grandad collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Boiler suit in cotton twill with a resort collar, buttons at the top, flap chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with wide elastication at the back and adjustable tabs and fasteners at the sides. Fake fly, diagonal side pockets and straight legs.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slightly deeper neckline, long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel in a contrasting colour.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a lace trim around the neckline and opening with twisted ties at the top. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining.
Umbrella with a transparent plastic canopy and a plastic handle.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a square neckline and smocked bodice. Small frill trim around the neckline and over the shoulders and long sleeves with a smocked seam at the top to create a puff effect at the shoulders. Narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft jersey made from a cotton and silk blend with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Cargo shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long chiffon dress with a lace bodice. Wide neckline, short cap sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a decorative grosgrain band and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Fully lined with support panels at the top.
Short chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim fit.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in ribbed organic cotton jersey. Square neckline with a broderie anglaise frill trim. Unlined.

Fitted blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Sweetheart neckline and a gathered seam at the top, a concealed zip in one side and short puff sleeves that are elasticated at the shoulders and hems. Partly lined.
Fine-knit jumper in soft merino wool with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and a scalloped neckline. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with pleats at the top. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Joggers in a soft, airy, fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved body in an airy textured weave in a loose fit at the top with a wrapover and concealed press-stud at the front, and jersey lower section with press-studs at the crotch.

Padded gilet in a quilted weave with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a round tab and chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Short coat in a felted wool blend with a faux fur collar, buttons at the front, side pockets and a pleat at the back. Lined.

Short dress in chiffon with broderie anglaise and a small frilled collar. V-neck opening with ties at the front, a gathered yoke at the shoulders, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a frill trim at the hem. Jersey lining.
Baby Exclusive. Shirt in an organic cotton weave with buttons and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Short slits in the sides.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Ankle boots in suede with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a lace yoke, small stand-up collar and partially concealed button placket. Short frilled lace sleeves, box pleat at the back and gently rounded hem.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs.
Sleeveless chiffon dress with an elasticated neckline with decorative gathers, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and smocking at the waist. Longer at the back. Satin lining.

Denim shirt made from a Tencel® lyocell blend with a button-down collar, classic front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Tops in a fine-knit cotton and linen blend with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the hem with a flounced trim.
Sleeveless top in a fine knit with an open back and wide ties at the back of the hem. Ribbed trims around the neckline, armholes and hem.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a pile front and padded mesh back. Zip at the top, zipped outer compartment and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Two mesh inner compartments. Lined. Size 8x15x30 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a cable-knit front, decorative bow at the neck and lace trim at the hem. Narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton velvet with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with long raglan sleeves decorated with plastic beads.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Blouse in an airy weave with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, frills at the front, concealed buttons on one shoulder and down the front and long puff sleeves with a button and frill at the cuffs.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood and zip down the front. Lined.
Dog jumper in a soft knit with a polo neck, ribbing around the front legs and an opening for the back legs.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted top in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Retro-look sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Cardigan in a soft knit with long sleeves, slits in the sides and no buttons.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, patch pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Lined.
Fitted top in airy jersey with a double-layered polo neck and long sleeves.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Short, fitted jersey dress with long sleeves and a visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Court shoes in imitation suede with rounded toes and covered block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Poncho in a soft weave with a fringed hem, and open sides and front. Length of front 85 cm. Length of back 65 cm.

Bikini top in lace with a tie detail at the front, underwired, moulded padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, straps that tie at the back of the neck and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Shoulder bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with one handle at the top and a detachable metal chain shoulder strap with carabiner hooks. Flap with a sparkly stone detail and magnetic fastener, an inner compartment with an open pocket, and an imitation suede lining. Size 8.5x14x22 cm.
Calf-length skirt in soft cotton poplin. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, and gathered tiers for added volume. Unlined.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets.

Top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend. Deep V-neck at the back with lacing that ties at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and a seam at the hem with a flared peplum.
Pull-on trousers in soft, slub-weave cotton with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and fake side pockets, one with a small fabric appliqué.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck opening at the front.
Socks in a soft, fluffy knit containing glittery threads.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a reflective print on one leg. Elasticated, drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Calf-length, straight-style tunic in a pleated weave with buttons down the front and narrow ties at the waist. Long raglan sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides.
